SELECT COUNT(ROLE_ID) AS totcnt FROM TB_ROLEINFO WHERE 1=1
AND ROLE_ID like '%' #{searchKeyword} '%'

SELECT A.MENU_NO , A.MENU_ORDR , A.MENU_NM , A.UPPER_MENU_NO , A.MENU_BASIC_INFO , ( SELECT COUNT(B.MENU_NO) FROM COMTNMENUCREATDTLS B WHERE B.MENU_NO = A.MENU_NO AND B.ROLE_ID = #{roleId}) AS "chkYeoBu" FROM COMTNMENUINFO A WHERE A.MENU_NO > 0 ORDER BY A.MENU_ORDR

SELECT A.MENU_NO , A.MENU_ORDR , A.MENU_NM , A.UPPER_MENU_NO , SUBSTRING(B.MENU_BASIC_INFO,1,1) MENU_S , SUBSTRING(B.MENU_BASIC_INFO,2,1) MENU_I , SUBSTRING(B.MENU_BASIC_INFO,3,1) MENU_E , SUBSTRING(B.MENU_BASIC_INFO,4,1) MENU_D , SUBSTRING(B.MENU_BASIC_INFO,5,1) MENU_X FROM COMTNMENUINFO A, COMTNMENUCREATDTLS B WHERE A.MENU_NO = B.MENU_NO
AND A.MENU_NO > 0
AND UPPER_MENU_NO <> 0
AND B.ROLE_ID = #{roleId} ORDER BY A.MENU_NO
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMTNMENUCREATDTLS ( ROLE_ID ,MENU_NO , MENU_BASIC_INFO, MENU_CREATE_DATE, MENU_CREATE_ID) VALUES ( #{roleId}, #{menuNo} , #{menuBasicInfo}, NOW(), #{userId})
